Desc.entry: Church of England parish church serving Wadsley, Loxley, Sutton, Middlewood and Wadsley Park Village.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 9am & 10.30am (including activities for children during the 10.30am service, term-time only), 7pm (youth group), Wed at 1.45pm (Toddler Praise for parents/carers and pre school children, term-time in the church hall), at 3.45pm (5 & 2 club, for children aged 5-11 years); Rainbows, Brownies, Guides, Beavers, Cubs & Scouts, please contact for days and times
